summary: SummaryMediheal's Madecassoside Moisture Calming Cleanser gently yet effectively removes impurities while soothing and hydrating skin. Infused with madecassoside for calming care, it leaves the skin soft, refresed, and comfortable after cleansing.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently yet effectively removing impurities with triple pore-deep cleansing, it delivers instant soothing hydration for soft, comfortable skin without tightness, making it ideal for dry or sensitive skin in need of calming care.Having completed a skin irritation test for sensitive skin and certified by Germany Dermatest, this mildly alkaline formula offers a refreshing greenery scent.With its dense whipped-cream foam, it gently deep cleanses using fine, tightly packed micro-bubbles.Key IngredientsMadecassoside Liposome - Helps soothe and protect the skin's moisture barrierPanthenol + Triple Hyaluronic Acid - Replenishes and locks in moisturePapain - Supports gentle exfoliation and keratin careResearch ResultsMoisture retention improvement: +105.66%Deep pore cleansing: 99.49% improvement after cleansingSebum removal inside pores: 112.08% improvement after useItem 2648309How To UseAdd water to create a creamy foam, gently massage onto the face, then rinse. Suitable for daily facial cleansing.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Palm Acid, Potassium Hydroxide, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Potassium Cocoate, Glyceryl Stearate, Polyquaternium-7, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Pyrus Communis (Pear) Fruit Extract, Juniperus Virginiana Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Sodium Phytate, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Iris Florentina Root Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Hedera Helix (Ivy) Leaf/Stem Extract, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Artemisia Vulgaris Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Betaine, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Papain, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butylene Glycol, Madecassoside, Lecithin, 1,2-Hexanediol.
how_to_use: Add water to create a creamy foam, gently massage onto the face, then rinse. Suitable for daily facial cleansing.
